item.title: GSoC 2021
item.description: 🌞 ️Summer 2021 I am happy to have been accepted to Google Summer of Code 2021 with the project “Pedagogical Interactive Notebooks for Algorithms Implemented in NetworkX”. I will be writing code under the mentorship of Eric Ma and Ross Barnowski. The goal of this project is to create Jupyter notebooks that will become detailed and intuitive tutorials containing the ideas behind, explanations and experimental analysis of the algorithms implemented in NetworkX.
